newsitem.title: ITALY: Benetton '96 cons net profit up 11.5 pct.
newsitem.headline: Benetton '96 cons net profit up 11.5 pct.

text.p: Note - Benetton group issued results in statement after board meeting.
Note - Benetton said it had eliminated net debt for the first time in its history and ended 1996 with liquidity of 133 billion lire.
It said the light fall in turnover was down to a marked appreciation of the lira and divestment of non-strategic businesses.
Gross operating margin was 40 percent of sales, slightly less than the previous year when it was 41.4 percent.
Globally, sales volume was up nearly four percent with a rise in European markets, eastern European countries and some Middle Eastern countries.
